Title: Friends with Burger-fits
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Dan Fybel, Mike Benner (staff writer)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Bob becomes Teddy's workout buddy after finding out his burgers contributed to Teddy's bad health. The two enroll in a stuntman boot camp where their friendship is put to the test. ...
